description.en: The geochemical nature of geological processes and the behavior of chemical elements in these processes are explained. Mechanisms of the distribution and migration of various chemical elements and compounds in natural processes are analyzed. The course introduces the basics of isotope geochemistry and methods of isotope dating in geology. The theoretical and practical parts of the course provide the necessary knowledge and skills needed for professional geological work.
description.et: Selgitatakse geoloogiliste protsesside geokeemilist olemust ja keemiliste elementide käitumist nendes protsessides. Analüüsitakse erinevate keemiliste elementide ja ühendite leviku- ja migratsioonimehhanisme looduslikes protsessides, tutvustatakse isotoopgeokeemia aluseid ning isotoopdateerimise meetodeid geoloogias. Ainekursuse teoreetiline ja praktiline osa annavad geoloogiliseks erialaseks tööks vajalikul tasemel teadmised ja oskused.

objectives.en: The course aims to introduce and explain the nature and peculiarities of chemical processes related to geological phenomena.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on tutvustada ja selgitada geoloogiliste nähtustega seotud keemiliste protsesside olemust ja iseärasust.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon completing the course, the student will be able to:
1.	Explain the mechanisms of the formation of chemical elements and their distribution in the universe and different spheres of the Earth;
learning_outcomes.et: 1.	seletab keemiliste elementide tekkemehhanisme ning nende jaotumist universumis ja Maa eri sfäärides;

learning_outcomes.en: 2.	Apply the fundamental principles of thermodynamics and chemical kinetics in the context of geology;
learning_outcomes.et: 2.	rakendab termodünaamika ja keemilise kineetika põhiprintsiipe geoloogia kontekstis;

learning_outcomes.en: 3.	Understand the main geochemical classifications of chemical elements;
learning_outcomes.et: 3.	teab peamisi keemiliste elementide geokeemilisi klassifikatsioone;

learning_outcomes.en: 4.	Describe key geological processes using the distribution of chemical elements and their isotopes;
learning_outcomes.et: 4.	kirjeldab keemiliste elementide ja nende isotoopide jaotumise abil olulisemaid geoloogilisi protsesse;

learning_outcomes.en: 5.	Date rocks based on their radiogenic isotope composition;
learning_outcomes.et: 5.	oskab dateerida kivimeid nende radiogeense isotoopkoostisi alusel;

learning_outcomes.en: 6.	Understand the major geochemical cycles of the Earth;
7.	Understand the main applications and fields of geochemistry;
learning_outcomes.et: 7.	on teadlik geokeemia põhilistest rakendusviisides ja valdkondadestt;

learning_outcomes.en: 8.	Apply the aforementioned knowledge and skills to solve geochemical problems.
